title: Entertainment Live: Downton Abbey Christmas special teased; Batman v Superman trailer reaction - BBC News

sir bruce forsyth pulls out of strictly christmas special .

documents.title: goodbye from us and vanilla ice
text: that 's all from today 's live updates of arts and entertainment news .
as it 's throwback thursday we 'll leave you with this thought - number one on this day 25 years ago was vanilla ice 's ice ice baby .
can you remember all the words ?
enjoy !
author: Frances Cronin
Entertainment Reporter

documents.title: fan changes band 's wikipedia entry to get backstage
text: you ca n't always believe everything you read on wikipedia , but for one music fan a fib he wrote on the website gained him access to his favourite band .
dave spargo tried to get backstage at a melbourne gig for peking duk , claiming to be related to the electronic duo .
he showed the security guard the band 's wikipedia page - which he had changed earlier - proving he was `` family '' and was let in .
but instead of the band being angry with spargo , they invited him to share a beer with them , saying he was `` the definition of a legend '' .
they later tweeted about it .
we do n't advise you to try this at home though
read the full story .
som1 edited our wiki 2 say he was our family .
showed security , got in2 the green room and had a beer with the boys
@ twitterid i love that you guys took this action of him with humor and not anyhow else ; ) and the meme fits perfectly , yeah .
@ twitterid well my dad always said , you can be dumb , you just need to know how to help yourself that man obviously knew ; )

documents.title: benedict cumberbatch 's hamlet leads what 's on stage nominations
text: benedict cumberbatch has been nominated for best actor for his performance of hamlet at the whatsonstage awards , with the barbican production up for a total of nine prizes .

cumberbatch faces competition from fellow hollywood star bradley cooper for his role in the elephant man , and james mcavoy , mark rylance and alex hassell for their performances in the ruling class , farinelli and the king and henry v respectively .
hamlet has the most nominations this year , alongside big musicals kinky boots and in the heights , which also have nine each .
nicole kidman has been nominated for best actress in a play for her part in photograph 51 .
she is up against rosalie craig ( as you like it ) , denise gough ( people , places , things ) , harriet walter ( death of a salesman ) and lia williams ( oresteia )
the winners will be announced on 21 february at the prince of wales theatre .

documents.title: luther creator 's new pre-apocalyptic drama for bbc
text: luther creator neil cross has been commissioned by the bbc to write a new pre-apocalyptic crime drama set in contemporary london for bbc one .
hard sun will follow detectives elaine renko and robert hicks as they seek to enforce the law and protect their loved ones in a world that every day slips closer to certain destruction .
cross says he has had the character and their world `` rattling round '' his head for a while :
imagine the world you see when you look out your window except it 's been given a death sentence .
this is n't science fiction .
this is the real world .
there 's no hero to come save us ; no contingency plan .
we 've got five years .
this is the world of hard sun and the world of elaine renko and robert hicks .
what 's it like , trying to keep order , trying to enforce the law in a city that , day by day , slips closer to certain destruction ?
and what about the predators ?
what about the murderers , the rapists , the thieves ?
what about the psychopaths , the religious nuts , the cult leaders , the serial killers ?
who among them would fear a prison sentence , in a world like this ?
who among them would fear legal consequences ?
what 's the point of justice in the face of armageddon ?

documents.title: obama romance heads to sundance
text: a romantic drama about barack obama 's first date with future wife michelle is among the titles set to be screened at the 2016 sundance film festival .
southside with you recreates the summer afternoon in 1989 when the future us president wooed his future first lady in chicago .
other films in the line-up include swiss army man , a road movie in which daniel radcliffe plays a corpse .
ellen page , mad men 's elisabeth moss and pop singer nick jonas are among the established names who appear in other films featured in the programme .
sundance 's 2016 edition runs from 21 to 31 january in park city , utah .
read more .

documents.title: daniel radcliffe 's accidental anti-freeze mishap
text: daniel radcliffe has revealed he once got violently ill after mistakenly drinking anti-freeze while filming 2013 fantasy thriller horns .
he told newsbeat :
we were filming in canada and no one told me that the water in the trailers coming out of the taps had got anti-freeze in to stop them freezing in the pipes overnight .
there were no signs , so i just drank a glass of it , did n't think anything of it and then about three hours later i felt a bit funny .
i just lay in bed for three days , with occasional trips to the toilet .
what was great about the doctor coming to see me was i had the horns on at the time .
read the full story .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: saatchi instagrams from miami art basel
text: today sees the start of art basel in miami beach where almost 300 galleries from around the world gather to show works .
the saatchi gallery has been instagramming of a selection of works , including these feather-covered bears by italian artist paola pivi .
ryan callahan 's zen stormtrooper is also on show .
as is whisbe 's vandal gummy bears .

documents.title: chewing gum gets second series
text: e4 comedy chewing gum is getting a second series .

created by actress , writer , award-winning playwright , singer and poet michaela coel , the show is based on her autobiographical monologue chewing gum dreams , which had an acclaimed run at the national theatre ,
chewing gum follows the life of religious , beyonce-obsessed tracey gordon as she tries to find her way in the world .
the first series which ended recently won rave reviews .
the new series will air on e4 next year .
coel said :
the love and support for my chewing gum baby has been overwhelming and i ca n't wait to get started on the second series .
all i 've got to do now is write it .
channel 4 press
c4press
e4 sticks with chewing gum for a second series ow.ly/vq6ce
e4 sticks with chewing gum for a second series

documents.title: scottish symphony orchestra turns 80
text: tonight , the bbc scottish symphony orchestra celebrates its 80th birthday with a concert at the city halls in glasgow .
having endured for nine decades is `` a fantastic achievement , '' violinist alex gasgcoine told bbc radio 3 's in tune .
he said the orchestra 's sound had changed in the 25 years since he joined , thanks to an expanded wind and string section .
his colleague greg lawson added it was possible to identify the scottish symphony just by listening to a recording .
`` in many ways , that 's the point of an orchestra - is to have an individual sound , '' he said .
and will they be celebrating after tonight 's performance ?
`` i 'm sure we 'll find something to do , '' said alex .
`` it is glasgow , after all ! ''
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: x factor single will help sick children
text: unbelievably , we 'll find out the winner of the x factor in just 10 days .
and whoever takes the title , the profits from their single will help two children 's charities , itv has announced .
together for short lives and shooting star chase both help children with life-threatening and life-limiting illnesses , providing support for their families and those who help them .
simon cowell 's record label will donate every penny it gets to the two charities - a figure expected to be at least £ 1 for each cd sold , and 20p for every download .
`` i 'm delighted that the x factor winner 's single sales will help families who are going through such unimaginably difficult times , '' said cowell .
last week , the x factor invited zoe - who has been supported by shooting star chase for eight years - along to rehearsals where she met the judges and contestants .

documents.title: derren brown 's dolls freak out commuters
text: there was a freaky sight for london commuters this morning as two life-size dolls made an appearance to mark the launch of what is being billed as the world 's first psychological theme park ride at thorpe park created by derren brown .
they appeared at charing cross tube station , oxford circus , regents street and hamleys where they apparently played with a toy train set , dolls and pushed an empty 1900s-style pram .
derren brown has explained what they were all about :
the victorian twin dolls , who have popped up around london this week , are just a taster of what my new attraction has in store for visitors to thorpe park next spring .
i believe we are moving toward a future where theme park attractions not only give you a physical experience but also play with your mind and the concept of what is real .
the star 's 13-minute `` experience '' will open at thorpe park in 2016 .

documents.title: stars gather for in the heart of the sea premiere
text: director ron howard and his cast of in the heart of the sea were in london 's leicester square last night for the film 's european premiere .
telling the true story which inspired moby dick , it sees chris hemsworth as the first mate on a whaling ship which is preyed upon by a sperm whale , stranding its crew at sea .
the thor star did n't seem to get the note to wear a dark coloured suit - opting instead to stand out in light grey .

documents.title: sheridan smith 's 'dream role ' in funny girl
text: sheridan smith says playing fanny brice in funny girl is her `` dream role '' .
the musical opened last night at london 's menier chocolate factory where it sold out its entire run in 90 minutes .
it transfers to the savoy theatre in april - its first west end revival in 50 years .
funny girl is the show that made barbra streisand a star .
she played fanny in new york and london and later on screen , winning an oscar .
smith told me after the show that the key to the role was `` putting your own stamp on it '' .
the critics seem to agree .
the telegraph says smith performed with `` such terrific aplomb that she has finally laid to rest the idea that no one but streisand could pull it off '' .
will the show end up on broadway after the west end ?
smith suggests she 'd love to give it a shot .
who would n't ?
i 'd be daft if i said no .
i would love to , that 's my dream .
who knows how long this journey will last but i will love every second of it .
sometimes in your life a role comes along at a specific time when you need it and feel ready for it and this is it for me .
i can pour all my emotion into it .
there 's a line where i say 'i live on stage ' and i do - i love it .
i ca n't beat that buzz , the relationship you have with an audience .
this role is escapism and it 's therapeutic and it 's my chance to go out there and let everything out .
i connect with fanny brice - although she was 1910 and this is 2015 - there 's something that really resonates .
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: wstrn break out the ballad
text: they only formed earlier this year , but wstrn 's slick debut single , in2 , reached the top 10 in the uk , with celebrity endorsements from the likes of wretch 32 , rita ora and alan carr - who covered the song on capital fm .
earlier this week , they made the longlist of the bbc 's sound of 2016 and , to celebrate , they 've just released a `` b-side '' for their hit single .
got love is that rare thing - a hip-hop ballad , with akelle , haile and louis paying tribute to the women in their lives .
aw , bless .

documents.title: professor green 's mysterious night
text: seems like professor green had a good night at the cosmopolitan ultimate women awards last night .
professor green
professorgreen
just woke up on a friends couch with absolutely no idea where i was

documents.title: the apprentice loses more candidates
text: if you have n't watched last night 's episode of the apprentice yet and do n't want the outcome to be spoiled , look away now .
we mean it , look away now .
ok , you 've been given fair warning - two candidates left lord sugar 's boardroom on wednesday , and one was of their own accord .
scott saunders made a surprise exit despite being on the winning team .
the 27-year-old said the decision was `` gut instinct '' , denying he quit in anger after a clash with lord sugar .
he said :
there was no anger there .
i was slightly upset with my performance and some of the comments made at the time , but it did n't feel right to go ahead because i did n't want the investment from lord sugar .
i do n't think we wanted to work together and it was clear on both sides .
here 's a reminder of scott 's audition tape .
his resignation came just before selina waterman-smith was fired after she failed to sell any properties as part of this week 's task .

documents.title: lana del rey : man arrested after camping out in her garage
text: a 19-year-old man has been arrested for trespassing at lana del rey 's mansion in malibu , california .
according to ew , he was found camping out in the garage of the seafront property , which is currently under construction .
a worker found him and confronted him - but he fled , leaving behind a laptop computer .
`` based on the ramblings in his notes , he was clearly infatuated with lana , '' a detective said .
he was later arrested in santa monica .
del rey was reportedly not at home during the incident .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: alan yentob steps down as bbc 's creative director
text: alan yentob , the bbc 's creative director , is to step down at the end of the year in the wake of the controversy over the failed kids company charity .
he had faced scrutiny over his role , as well as claims he tried to influence coverage at the bbc of its troubles .
yentob said :

the bbc is going through particularly challenging times and i have come to believe that the speculation about kids company and the media coverage revolving around my role is proving a serious distraction .

so i have spoken to tony hall and told him that i think it best that i step down from my senior management role as creative director at the end of this year and focus on programme making and tv production - including of course the imagine series .
i love the bbc and will continue to do everything i can to ensure that it thrives and fulfills the great expectations we all have of it .
director general tony hall said yentob was `` a towering figure in television '' and had `` served the bbc with distinction '' .
he added :
for the record , bbc news considered whether alan yentob had influenced the bbc 's journalism on the reporting of kids company .
they concluded that he did not .
despite that , i understand his reasons for stepping down as creative director .
he has been thinking about this carefully for some time and we have discussed it privately on a number of occasions .

documents.title: sir bruce forsyth to miss strictly christmas special
text: sir bruce forsyth has had to pull out of hosting the strictly come dancing christmas special due to health reasons .
he is still recovering from keyhole surgery he had in november on an abdominal aortic aneurysm .
the 87-year-old 's condition was discovered after he had extensive medical checks following a recent fall .
the bbc said :
the strictly christmas special , which records next week , will be too early for sir bruce forsyth to have made a full recovery from his recent operation .
due to the long studio hours , he is unable to host the show but will still play a part in the production .

sir bruce will record a special video message for this year 's celebrity line-up and the viewers at home , which will play out when the strictly christmas special airs on bbc one on christmas day at 6:15pm .
claudia winkleman will now host the special show alongside tess daly .

documents.title: carrie fisher named ultimate icon
text: carrie fisher was voted the ultimate icon at the cosmopolitan ultimate women award in london last night .
the apprentice 's karren brady , little mix , jess glynne and caroline flack were also winners .
as was rebel wilson who was named ultimate woman .
here she is with brady and flack , who all got the black dress memo .
little mix were serious on the red carpet .
ferne cotton hosted the awards , with guests including michelle keegan , great british bake off winner nadiya hussain , professor green and millie mackintosh .

documents.title: one last christmas with downton abbey
text: itv has released a clip of the downton abbey christmas special - the last ever episode of the period drama .

set to the tune of auld lang syne , get your hankies ready for `` all the love and loss , happiness and heartbreak as the family and servants prepare to welcome 1926 with an unforgettable new year 's eve '' .

documents.title: kevin spacey turns acting teacher
text: oscar winner kevin spacey has taken a perhaps surprising new career path and put himself forward as an acting teacher .
you can sign up online for his classes for $ 90 ( £ 60 ) which will give you 29 video lessons and a 40-page workbook .
apparently `` kevin teaches you his unique approach to the craft of acting in over five hours of lessons '' .

documents.title: fifty hits in 300 seconds
text: every year since 2007 , san francisco 's jordan roseman - aka dj earworm - has taken the 25 top-selling songs in the us and combined them into one gigantic meta-mix .
this year , in tribute to love me like you do - ellie goulding 's fifty shades of grey anthem - he 's expanded his efforts to include the top 50 songs on the billboard chart .
the result is almost impressionistic , as hooks and samples flit in and out of view over the course of five minutes .
yet it all hangs together , creating an entirely new song from a kit of parts provided by the weeknd , taylor swift , justin bieber , sam smith and drake .
or , to put it another way :
questlove gomez
questlove
hard proof that we 've been hearing the same song over and over and over and over in 2015 youtu.be/rffehd7mk7c
take a listen below :
the full list of songs is available on dj earworm 's youtube channel .

documents.title: second batman v superman trailer released
text: first up , a second trailer has been released for batman v superman : dawn of justice .
the new three-minute clip gives fuller glimpses of wonder woman and lex luthor , as well as a bit more banter between the caped crusader and man of steel .

documents.title: get involved with the news
text: let us know your thoughts on today 's news .
two new trailers have also been making waves overnight - the downton abbey christmas special and batman v superman .
have you seen them and what do you think ?
tweet @ twitterid or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: welcome to thursday
text: hello and welcome to today 's live updates of entertainment and arts news .
coming up the reviews are in for sheridan smith 's funny girl and kevin spacey offers himself as an acting coach .
and if you missed what happened yesterday , check out wednesday 's live page .
author: Frances Cronin
Entertainment Reporter
